title: The cop in the Wildwood beach arrest that went viral on video was a temporary officer. Jersey Shore towns use them every summer
title_page: The cop in the Wildwood beach arrest that went viral on video was a temporary officer. Jersey Shore towns use them every summer
maintext:
The cop in the Wildwood beach arrest that went viral on video was a temporary officer. Jersey Shore towns use them every summer
By Staff
A viral video of a violent clash between a young mother and a temporary police officer on the Wildwood beach on Memorial Day weekend highlights the difficulties for Jersey Shore towns as summer descends and, with it, out-of-town crowds.
In some towns, police departments more than double the size of their forces, hiring temporary help to boost their troops.
Continue reading on Philly.com
http://www.philly.com/philly/news/crime/jersey-shore-wildwood-police-excessive-force-20180601.html
